body_html:
I just re-ran conda install ninja , which returned:

(base) C:\src\magma_cuda90\pytorch>conda install ninja
Solving environment: done

==> WARNING: A newer version of conda exists. <==
current version: 4.4.10
latest version: 4.5.0

Please update conda by running

$ conda update -n base conda

Package Plan

environment location: C:\src\magma_cuda90\pytorch\Miniconda3

added / updated specs:
- ninja

The following packages will be downloaded:

package                    |            build
---------------------------|-----------------
msys2-conda-epoch-20160418 |                1           2 KB
ninja-1.7.2                |                0         1.8 MB
------------------------------------------------------------
                                       Total:         1.8 MB

The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

msys2-conda-epoch: 20160418-1
ninja:             1.7.2-0

Proceed ([y]/n)? y

Downloading and Extracting Packages
msys2-conda-epoch 20160418: ################################################################################### | 100%
ninja 1.7.2: ################################################################################################## | 100%
Preparing transaction: done
Verifying transaction: done
Executing transaction: done

but then I got the same output (with the same CMake errors) after re-running build_pytorch.bat

Maybe it's another dependency?

body:
I just re-ran `conda install ninja` , which returned:

> (base) C:\src\magma_cuda90\pytorch>conda install ninja
> Solving environment: done
> 
> 
> ==> WARNING: A newer version of conda exists. <==
>   current version: 4.4.10
>   latest version: 4.5.0
> 
> Please update conda by running
> 
>     $ conda update -n base conda
> 
> 
> 
> ## Package Plan ##
> 
>   environment location: C:\src\magma_cuda90\pytorch\Miniconda3
> 
>   added / updated specs:
>     - ninja
> 
> 
> The following packages will be downloaded:
> 
>     package                    |            build
>     ---------------------------|-----------------
>     msys2-conda-epoch-20160418 |                1           2 KB
>     ninja-1.7.2                |                0         1.8 MB
>     ------------------------------------------------------------
>                                            Total:         1.8 MB
> 
> The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:
> 
>     msys2-conda-epoch: 20160418-1
>     ninja:             1.7.2-0
> 
> Proceed ([y]/n)? y
> 
> 
> Downloading and Extracting Packages
> msys2-conda-epoch 20160418: ################################################################################### | 100%
> ninja 1.7.2: ################################################################################################## | 100%
> Preparing transaction: done
> Verifying transaction: done
> Executing transaction: done

but then I got the same output (with the same CMake errors) after re-running `build_pytorch.bat`

Maybe it's another dependency?
